department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: sheath made from U-shaped hide wedge folded and closed with hide laces on curved side; 2 diamonds cut into hide near top on one side with hide lace strung through holes and knotted; red, green and black lines and Y-shapes throughout sheath; knife has wood handle and curved blade
dimension: H.11-3/4 x W.3-1/16 x D.1 in. (overall, without laces)
title: Parfleche Knife Sheath and Knife
